function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Open access classes for children may increase the risk of contagion in the community.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among children and their families.","Mitigation":"Limit the number of children in each class, implement social distancing, and enforce strict hygiene protocols.","Technologies":"Digital registration and monitoring systems, contactless payment systems.","People":"Children, their families, and the community.","Owner":"Gym owners, local authorities, and parents."},{"Description":"Continuing indoor activities without appropriate safety measures may lead to a higher risk of contagion.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission among members and staff.","Mitigation":"Implement ventilation improvements, enforce mask-wearing, and conduct regular testing and health screenings.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, temperature screening devices, and automated attendance tracking.","People":"Gym members, staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Gym owners, facility management, and health authorities."},{"Description":"Sharing information and interacting closely with competitors may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","Impact":"Potential spread of disease among business stakeholders and employees.","Mitigation":"Limit in-person interactions, prioritize virtual communication, and adhere to strict sanitation and safety guidelines.","Technologies":"Virtual collaboration platforms, digital document sharing, and virtual meeting software.","People":"Business stakeholders, employees, and customers.","Owner":"Business owners, management, and public health authorities."}]}
